acceptance_criteria: Frontend split into <10 focused component files

validation_steps: Test all existing features still work

1.1.notes: COMPLETED 2025-09-19. Successfully broke down 2,086-line monolithic file into 9 focused components. All 6 routes (/, /test, /health, /profile, /chat, /progress) working correctly. Architecture improved with clear separation of concerns: styles.py (414 lines), layout.py (155 lines), diagnostic.py (291 lines), home.py (112 lines), profile.py (565 lines), chat.py (499 lines), progress.py (91 lines), main.py (48 lines), server.py (20 lines). Performance and functionality preserved. Ready for Task 1.2.
